directive_ref: CEO DIRECTIVE WAVE 15/15A - AUTONOMOUS GOLDEN NEEDLE HUNT WITH SOURCE ATTRIBUTION

sources.snippet_or_excerpt: The Bank of Japan plans a historic interest rate hike, impacting the global economy and leading to volatility in cryptocurrency markets.
By officially putting an end to the quantitative tightening (QT) on Dec. 1, the US Federal Reserve has initiated the first steps for...
Despite calmer prices after October's brutal leverage wipeout, bitcoin and ether market depth remains structurally thin, creating a more...
Crypto whales—entities holding significant portions of a token's supply—play a pivotal role in shaping market dynamics through their buying,...
Japan's rising bond yields drive gold and silver higher while pressuring Bitcoin as global liquidity tightens.

hypothesis_content.title: Liquidity-Driven Volatility Compression Breakout
hypothesis_content.statement: Current low volatility (post-October crash) will compress further for 24-48 hours as markets digest liquidity news, then explode upward with a volatility breakout exceeding 2.5x daily ATR.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Liquidity shifts often cause volatility compression then expansion. Current news creates uncertainty (compression) followed by directional consensus (expansion). Post-crash conditions plus Fed/Japan news create ideal setup for volatility explosion.
entry_conditions: Waiting for: 4-hour candle closes above upper Bollinger Band with volume > 1.5x average

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price reaches 1.5x Bollinger Band width projection OR 5% gain
exit_conditions.stop_loss: False breakout: price re-enters Bollinger Band within 4 hours

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Volatility remains compressed (<1.5x ATR move) for 72+ hours post-breakout signal, indicating lack of conviction despite liquidity news.
